price: E for trazida, nesse dia, a Geena; nesse dia, o ser humano lembrar-se-á de seu erro. E como a lembrança haverá de beneficiá-lo?
arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wajīa yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insānu wa-annā lahu al-dhik'rā
